description: Microsoft warns that Chinese threat actors use the Quad7 botnet, compromised of hacked SOHO routers, to steal credentials in password-spray attacks. [...]
title: Microsoft: Chinese hackers use Quad7 botnet to steal credentials

description: ​Microsoft is again delaying the rollout of its AI-powered Windows Recall feature after announcing in August that it will be available for Insiders with Copilot+ PCs in October. [...]
title: Microsoft delays Windows Recall again, now by December

description: Hackers are attempting to exploit two zero-day vulnerabilities in PTZOptics pan-tilt-zoom (PTZ) live streaming cameras used in industrial, healthcare, business conferences, government, and courtroom settings. [...]
title: Hackers target critical zero-day vulnerability in PTZ cameras

description: ​Microsoft announced today that Windows 10 home users can delay the switch to Windows 11 for one more year if they're willing to pay $30 for Extended Security Updates (ESU). [...]
title: Microsoft wants $30 if you want to delay Windows 11 switch

description: ​Microsoft is investigating a new Windows 11 issue that causes the Task Manager to say there are zero running apps and background processes. [...]
title: Windows 11 Task Manager bug shows wrong number of running processes

description: ​Microsoft is investigating a new Windows 11 issue that causes the Task Manager to say there are zero running apps and background processes. [...]
title: Windows 11 Task Manager says no apps are active after preview update

description: The free version of the popular WordPress plugin LiteSpeed Cache has fixed a dangerous privilege elevation flaw on its latest release that could allow unauthenticated site visitors to gain admin rights. [...]
title: LiteSpeed Cache WordPress plugin bug lets hackers get admin access

description: qBittorrent has addressed a remote code execution flaw caused by the failure to validate SSL/TLS certificates in the application's DownloadManager, a component that manages downloads throughout the app. [...]
title: qBittorrent fixes flaw exposing users to MitM attacks for 14 years

description: Microsoft has fixed a known issue that prevents some apps launched from non-admin accounts from starting on Windows 10 22H2 systems after installing the September preview cumulative update. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes Windows 10 bug causing apps to stop working

description: A phishing campaign dubbed 'Phish n' Ships' has been underway since at least 2019, infecting over a thousand legitimate online stores to promote fake product listings for hard-to-find items. [...]
title: Over a thousand online shops hacked to show fake product listings

description: A commissioned study conducted by Forrester Consulting on behalf of Cynet in October 2024 found that Cynet's All-in-One Cybersecurity Platform generated $2.73 million in savings, paying for itself in under six months, for a return on investment of 426%. [...]
title: Cynet delivers 426% ROI in Forrester Total Economic Impact Study

description: The popular LottieFiles Lotti-Player project was compromised in a supply chain attack to inject a crypto drainer into websites using the library that steals visitors' cryptocurrency. [...]
title: LottieFiles hacked in supply chain attack to steal users’ crypto

description: LottieFiles announced that specific versions of its npm package carry malicious code that prompts users to connect their cryptocurrency wallets so they can be emptied. [...]
title: LottieFiles hit in npm supply chain attack targeting users' crypto
